sentences.en: David's good looks and impeccable manners had always made her blind to his faults.
sentences.cn: 戴维英俊的长相和完美的举止总是让她对他的缺点视而不见。

sentences.en: He dressed well and had impeccable manners.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠楚楚，待人接物无可挑剔。

sentences.en: He has an impeccable sense of timing.
sentences.cn: 他有着无可挑剔的节奏感。

sentences.en: He stood before them, impeccable as ever.
sentences.cn: 他站在他们面前, 跟以往一样完美无瑕.

sentences.en: He was always composed ; his manners, except on one or two occasions, were impeccable.
sentences.cn: 他一直 神态自若, 除一两次外,举止态度都无懈可击.

sentences.en: Her work is executed with impeccable taste.
sentences.cn: 她的作品完美无缺,无可挑剔.

sentences.en: My logic was impeccable back when S & P traded at 1281.
sentences.cn: 当标普指数位于 1281点 时,我的逻辑可谓无懈可击.

sentences.en: She comes across as a young lady of impeccable education and taste.
sentences.cn: 她遇到一位教养和品味都无可挑剔的年轻女子.

sentences.en: She had an impeccable aristocratic pedigree.
She had impeccable taste in clothes.
sentences.cn: 她的穿衣品位无可挑剔。

sentences.en: She has taught her children impeccable manners.
sentences.cn: 她把她的孩子教育得举止十分得体。

sentences.en: The furnishings and paintings had been chosen with impeccable taste.
sentences.cn: 室内的家具和油画都经过精心选择.

sentences.en: The optimum strategy is gentle defence; gentle, but subtle; subtle and impeccable.
sentences.cn: 最佳的策略是温柔的防御; 温柔, 但微妙的; 微妙,而无懈可击的.
的确, 洪堡的遣词用字是无可指责的.

sentences.en: You know, Fee, your taste is impeccable.
sentences.cn: 你知道, 菲, 你的审美观是无可挑剔的.

trans.tran_cn: 无缺点的，无瑕疵的，不会做坏事的
trans.tran_en: without any faults and impossible to criticize
